business_strategies.strategy: Brand as the only sustainable moat - occupy mental space so no one searches for alternatives
business_strategies.implementation: Be like Coca-Cola - people choose you because of brand recognition, not lock-in
business_strategies.expected_results: Sustainable competitive advantage through brand dominance
business_strategies.case_study: Coca-Cola - people drink it because it's Coca-Cola, not due to any technical lock-in

business_strategies.strategy: Peter Thiel's approach - best way to compete is to not compete
business_strategies.implementation: Find uncontested market space through strong branding

problems_solutions.problem: Remote teams struggling with PM-engineer processes during COVID
problems_solutions.solution: Build tools specifically for remote PM-engineer collaboration

startup_ideas.idea: K-pop style factories for specialized startup talent
startup_ideas.target_market: Startups needing growth marketers, dev evangelists, design engineers
startup_ideas.business_model: Training programs that produce senior specialists quickly for high-paying focused jobs
startup_ideas.validation: Track emerging job titles on Google Trends

mistakes_to_avoid.mistake: Not appreciating that founding a startup is 10-15 years of your life
mistakes_to_avoid.consequences: Working on something you don't love or understand
mistakes_to_avoid.prevention: Work on problems you've personally faced and resonate with
mistakes_to_avoid.example: Founders chose Jam over 141 other ideas because they experienced the problem firsthand

growth_tactics.tactic: Use Google Trends to identify emerging job titles and roles
steps: Notice new job titles mentioned 2-3 times
Build training programs around growing roles
growth_tactics.results_expected: First-mover advantage in training for new specialized roles

trends_signals.trend: Moats are dead, brand is the new moat
trends_signals.opportunity: Focus on brand building over traditional competitive moats

trends_signals.trend: Emerging specialized roles like design engineers
trends_signals.opportunity: Create training programs for new specialized roles before competition
